content: i ve made a complete instruction pdf-file in english and dutch a written crochet pattern to make sleeping doll isabelle isabelle is made of scheepjes softfun you receive a pdf file of 8 pages where all steps are described in stitches included list of tools and materials written pattern of all bodyparts pictures isabelle is crocheted with yarn suitable for crochet needle 3 mm if you have any questions feel free to contact me madebylaris@gmail com
